name: gulp-web-build-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate for web development, includes Gulp, Browser Sync, Browserify and ES6

scripts.install: mkdir -p src && mkdir -p src/kit && mkdir -p assets && mkdir -p assets/sass && mkdir -p assets/css && mkdir -p assets/img && mkdir -p assets/js && mkdir -p assets/js/src && mkdir -p assets/js/dist && mkdir -p assets/fonts && mkdir -p assets/img && touch index.html touch src/kit/index.kit && touch assets/js/src/app.js && touch assets/sass/app.scss

author: Victory James Ugwudike (W&S)
